name: Tile Slider
description:
Tile-sliding puzzle game.

Dive into a world of puzzles with our tile sliding game, featuring 20 challenging levels that will test your problem-solving skills. Each level presents a unique challenge that requires strategic moves to arrange tiles into the correct pattern. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages, this game combines classic mechanics with modern design, providing hours of engaging gameplay. Unlock new levels and sharpen your cognitive abilities whilst enjoying the satisfying progression as you master the art of tile sliding.
